item.title: Pic-a-POD 2.0.4 for Mac
item.description: The latest update for Pic-a-POD for Mac is now available through the Mac App Store. Bug fix: selecting an iPhoto pic from the Recent Desktops menu now works correctly. New features: Better indication of downloads and when large pics are not yet available Direct link to App Store in Help menu - please rate or review.
